name: gulp-appdmg
description: Generate beautiful DMG-images for your OS X applications.
readme:
gulp-appdmg ======================== ![](https://david-dm.org/Aluxian/gulp-appdmg.png) ![](https://api.travis-ci.org/Aluxian/gulp-appdmg.svg?branch=master) Generate beautiful DMG-images for your OS X applications. ## Information
Package gulp-appdmg
Description A simple wrapper for `node-appdmg`
Node Version >= 0.10
## Usage ```javascript var appdmg = require('gulp-appdmg'); gulp.task('release-osx', function() { return gulp.src([]) .pipe(appdmg({ source: 'test/appdmg.json', target: 'test.dmg' })); }); ``` ## Options You only have to pass the `source` and `target`.
